data.title: Archived: New Zealand Breakers NBL24 Season
data.meta_description: Witness the NBL's top handles, dishes and dunks this season as the SKYCITY Breakers go after the Championship Title.
data.text:
Spark Arena games over the holidays include:

Friday 22 December, 7:30pm | BNZ Breakers vs Sydney Kings

This game is a match up against the Sydney Kings who we battled in the finals last season in front of record-breaking crowds. This game will be Christmas themed with an appearance from Santa gifting toys to children. Buy tickets her

Sunday 7 January, 4pm | BNZ Breakers vs Perth Wildcats

A 4pm tip off makes this the perfect game to bring kids along to. This game's theme is Mascot Party....which means our very own mascot, Cheeky the Kea, will be joined by mascots from across the country for a supersized party on the basketball court. Buy tickets here.
